definition: abbr. for Singapore 新加坡 and Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: In that time, there were two mains themes in Chinese literary writings.
sentences.chinese: 那时新马华文文学作品有两个主要的主题。

sentences.english: As for Chinese, we read more writings in the literary.
sentences.chinese: 那时新马华文文学作品有两个主要的主题。

sentences.english: The cavalry unit must be remounted immediately.
sentences.chinese: 骑兵部队必须立即补充新马。

sentences.english: Before Independence, we were used to treating Singapore and Malaysia as an entity.
sentences.chinese: 在新加坡独立之前，我们习惯将新马当作一个整体。

sentences.english: Soon, the alumni associations in Singapore and Malaysia were taking turns to host these gatherings.
sentences.chinese: 接着新马各地的南大校友会轮流主办“南大之夜”。

definition: abbr. for Macao 澳門|澳门/abbr. for Australia 澳大利亞|澳大利亚
Ipoh city in Malaysia, capital of Sultanate of Perak on Malayan peninsula
Johor (state of Malaysia at south of Malayan peninsula)
